subtext: Join in with the Paris Olympics!
subtextLong: Sign up to start your journey and the Nuffield team will be in contact to book your place in the race! Contact greg.blue@hsbc.com to register.

Stress Management and resilience seminar with Matthew from Nuffield Health. Exploring practical approaches at work and home, to build resilience for challenging situations, identify and apply a toolbox of stress management skills to positively adapt in constantly changing environments.

subtext: Guided tour of our Art Collection
subtextLong: The HSBC collection celebrates different perspectives of our people and the communities we serve by acquiring artists who either depict the people and landscapes around them, or those who explore the feelings, thoughts, and emotional landscapes of subjects such as identity, society or the environment.
